displayProperties.name: From the Ashes
displayProperties.description: Upgrade multiple pieces of Sunlit armor.

displayProperties.name: Flamekeeper
displayProperties.description: Title claimed

displayProperties.name: In the Hot Seat
displayProperties.description: Complete activities on Neptune to earn Silver Leaves.

displayProperties.name: Battle Rhythm
displayProperties.description: Defeat targets in ritual activities while using Auto Rifles, Hand Cannons, Scout Rifles, Glaives, or Linear Fusion Rifles. Bonus progress is granted for defeating Guardians.

displayProperties.name: Bashing Success
displayProperties.description: Complete the Bonfire Bash activity.

displayProperties.name: A Spark in the Dark
displayProperties.description: Complete rounds of Altars of Sorrow or Salvage to earn Silver Leaves.

displayProperties.name: Forged in Flame
displayProperties.description: Defeat opposing Guardians in any activity.

displayProperties.name: Burn Them Down
displayProperties.description: Defeat bosses anywhere in the system.

displayProperties.name: Like Wildfire
displayProperties.description: Defeat targets anywhere in the system. Defeating Guardians awards bonus progress.

displayProperties.name: Fires of Competition
displayProperties.description: Complete matches in Crucible or Gambit playlists to earn Silver Leaves.

displayProperties.name: Torch the Taken
displayProperties.description: Defeat Prismatic Taken in the Bonfire Bash.

displayProperties.name: Fuel for the Fire
displayProperties.description: Stoke the flames in the Bonfire Bash.

displayProperties.name: Fuel for the Fire II
displayProperties.description: Stoke more flames in the Bonfire Bash.

displayProperties.name: Fuel for the Fire III
displayProperties.description: Stoke even more flames in the Bonfire Bash.

displayProperties.name: Sunlight 'Em Up
displayProperties.description: While wearing a set of fully rekindled Sunlit armor, complete dungeons, raids, Master or Grandmaster Nightfalls, or win rounds in Trials of Osiris.

displayProperties.name: Raking the Coals
displayProperties.description: Complete playlist activities to earn Silver Leaves.

displayProperties.name: Superlative
displayProperties.description: Defeat targets with Super abilities.

displayProperties.name: Ash Tray
displayProperties.description: Collect Silver Ash.

displayProperties.name: Something Wicked This Way Comes
displayProperties.description: Earn the Exotic Scout Rifle, Wicked Implement.

displayProperties.name: Wicked Implement Catalyst
displayProperties.description: Defeat targets while using Wicked Implement.

displayProperties.name: Words and Action
displayProperties.description: Destroy each Pyramid object hidden beneath the Deep and hear Xivu Arath's words.

displayProperties.name: Let Brutality be Thy Whetstone
displayProperties.description: Find the catalyst for the Exotic Scout Rifle, Wicked Implement.

displayProperties.name: Brightfall
displayProperties.description: Complete Vanguard Ops or Nightfalls to earn Silver Leaves.

displayProperties.name: Flamekeeper
displayProperties.description: Complete Event Challenges during Solstice. Progress resets at the end of the event.

displayProperties.name: Dare to Dream
displayProperties.description: Complete runs of the Blind Well or Dares of Eternity to earn Silver Leaves.

displayProperties.name: Hand Lighter
displayProperties.description: Defeat targets with Hand Cannons, Shotguns, and Rocket Launchers.

displayProperties.name: Good Ignite
displayProperties.description: Defeat Ignition Carriers in the Bonfire Bash.
